Reviews.Title: Lens filter was missing.
Reviews.Author: Amelia Oldewurtel
Reviews.Content: It was suppose to have a lens filter included with the order, however it was not in the package. It was a gift for my son and he loves it. However, does wish the filter would have been in the package. It was too late to send it back.

ProductInfo.Features:
Filterless Design for Superb Resolution
16.3 MP CMOS Sensor
3.0" Air-Gap-Free LCD w/ 921k Dots
11 Point SAFOX X Autofocus System
1080p HD Video w/ External Mic Jack
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax K-5 IIs Digital SLR Camera with SMC DA L 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 Lens Kit. Includes: UV Filter, 16GB Memory Card, High Speed Memory Card Reader, Extended Life Replacement Battery, Charger & Carrying Case
